attributes.action: Reduce global warming by taking positive action to encourage cycling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reduce global warming by taking positive action to encourage cycling.  
Re-allocate national resources, by requiring local councils to review footpath usage and re-designate all under-utilised footpaths as combined cycle/pedestrian ways, (with guidance that cyclists always give way to pedestrians).
